import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; import profileImage from "./assets/profile.png"; // Update the path to your profile image const About = () => { return (
{/* Left Section */}

Hello, I’m Deepa Devangmath

I am a licensed architect from India, currently in my ninth year of studying architecture. My research delves into how space impacts human behavior and, in turn, their mental well-being. My design philosophy centers on creating harmony between context, built form, and users. I have actively collaborated on various live projects and take great interest in conducting case studies of thoughtfully designed spaces, focusing on their construction methods, material choices, and zoning strategies.

{/* Right Section */}

Contact

devangmathdeepa@gmail.com

2024 - Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago, USA

Office Intern

2023 July - 2024 Freelance Architect

Skills

Modeling: SketchUp, Rhino, Grasshopper

Render: Lumion, V-Ray, Enscape

Adobe: Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere

); }; export default About;
